languages.text: {n}В прозрачных глазах Инцендии нет ничего, кроме нечеловеческой правоты.{/n} "Такой путь мне был указан. Там, куда ты идешь, вершится зло против Императора. Если ты ступишь во тьму, то сможешь вырвать отравленный корень, из которого растет преступление. Значит, твой путь должен быть проложен и расчищен праведными. Посему прими сей дар справедливого истребления, чтобы в судный час он подсказал тебе верное решение".

{n}There is nothing in Incendia's clear eyes but a righteous conviction that almost seems inhuman.{/n} "That was the path revealed to me. You are going to a place where evil is being wrought against the Emperor. If you step into this darkness, you can pluck the poisoned root from which the vile deed stems. As such, your path must be charted and cleared by those pure of faith. Therefore, accept this gift of righteous annihilation so that, come the hour of judgement, it helps direct you to the right course of action."
languages.original_text: {n}В прозрачных глазах Инцендии нет ничего, кроме нечеловеческой правоты.{/n} "Такой путь мне был указан. Там, куда ты идешь, вершится зло против Императора. Если ты ступишь во тьму, то сможешь вырвать отравленный корень, из которого растет преступление. Значит, твой путь должен быть проложен и расчищен праведными. Посему прими сей дар справедливого истребления, чтобы в судный час он подсказал тебе верное решение".

traits.locale_text: {n}There's nothing in Incendia's clear eyes but righteous conviction that almost seems inhuman.{/n} "That was the path revealed to me. You are going to a place where evil is being wrought against the Emperor. If you step into the darkness, you can pluck the poisoned root from which the crime stems. Therefore your path must be charted and cleared by such as are pure of faith. Therefore accept this gift of righteous annihilation so that, come the hour of judgment, it tells you the right course of action."
traits.speaker: Chorda_Companion

languages.text: {n}No hay nada en la mirada de Incendia salvo una convicción fundamentalista que raya en lo inhumano.{/n} «Ese fue el camino que me fue revelado. Usted se dirige a un lugar en el que se obran maldades contra el Emperador. Si se adentra en esas tinieblas, podrá arrancar la ponzoñosa raíz de la que germinan esas viles afrentas. Por lo tanto, su ruta deben trazarla y despejarla quienes profesen una fe pura. Le ruego pues que acepte este obsequio de aniquilación virtuosa para que, llegada la hora del juicio, le ayude directamente a obrar con rectitud».
languages.original_text: {n}There is nothing in Incendia's clear eyes but a righteous conviction that almost seems inhuman.{/n} "That was the path revealed to me. You are going to a place where evil is being wrought against the Emperor. If you step into this darkness, you can pluck the poisoned root from which the vile deed stems. As such, your path must be charted and cleared by those pure of faith. Therefore, accept this gift of righteous annihilation so that, come the hour of judgement, it helps direct you to the right course of action."

Por lo tanto, su ruta deben trazarla y despejarla quienes profesen una fe pura. Le ruego pues que acepte este obsequio de aniquilación virtuosa para que, llegada la hora del juicio, le ayude directamente a obrar con rectitud».
traits.speaker: Chorda_Companion

languages.text: {n}因森蒂娅的眼睛清澈无比，没有任何杂质，只有超然的正义信念。{/n}“这就是我的道路。在你要去的地方，那些邪恶之人打算对付帝皇。只有踏入这暗之中，才能彻底铲除恶行的毒根。因此，只有拥有纯粹信仰的人，才能为你指引方向，肃清障碍。请你接受这件正义的礼物。当审判之刻到来时，它会帮助你找到正确的前进方向。”
languages.original_text: {n}There is nothing in Incendia's clear eyes but a righteous conviction that almost seems inhuman.{/n} "That was the path revealed to me. You are going to a place where evil is being wrought against the Emperor. If you step into this darkness, you can pluck the poisoned root from which the vile deed stems. As such, your path must be charted and cleared by those pure of faith. Therefore, accept this gift of righteous annihilation so that, come the hour of judgement, it helps direct you to the right course of action."

traits.speaker: Chorda_Companion

languages.text: {n}Les yeux clairs d'Incendia sont empreints d'une juste conviction si forte qu'elle en paraît non-humaine.{/n} « C'est la voie qui m'a été révélée. Vous vous rendez à un endroit où le règne de l'Empereur est mis à mal par ses ennemis. Si vous pénétrez dans ces ténèbres, vous serez en mesure d'arracher la racine empoisonnée de ce mal. Par conséquent, votre voie doit être tracée et dégagée par ceux dont la foi est pure. Acceptez donc ce don de juste châtiment qui vous aidera à prendre les bonnes décisions lorsque sonnera l'heure du jugement. »
languages.original_text: {n}There is nothing in Incendia's clear eyes but a righteous conviction that almost seems inhuman.{/n} "That was the path revealed to me. You are going to a place where evil is being wrought against the Emperor. If you step into this darkness, you can pluck the poisoned root from which the vile deed stems. As such, your path must be charted and cleared by those pure of faith. Therefore, accept this gift of righteous annihilation so that, come the hour of judgement, it helps direct you to the right course of action."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux clairs d'Incendia sont empreints d'une juste conviction si forte qu'elle en paraît inhumaine.{/n} « C'est la voie qui m'a été révélée. Vous vous rendez à un endroit où le règne de l'Empereur est mis à mal par ses ennemis. Si vous pénétrez dans ces ténèbres, vous serez en mesure d'arracher la racine empoisonnée de ce mal. Par conséquent, votre voie doit être tracée et dégagée par ceux dont la foi est pure. Acceptez donc ce don de juste châtiment qui vous aidera à prendre les bonnes décisions lorsque sonnera l'heure du jugement. »
traits.speaker: Chorda_Companion

languages.text: {n}インセンディアの澄んだ瞳には、まるで非人間的な正義が燃えていた。{/n}「それが私に啓示された道だ。あなたは皇帝に対する悪が行われている場所に赴くのだろう。この暗闇に足を踏み入れれば、卑劣な行為に由来する毒の根を摘み取ることができる。それがため、あなたの道は、純粋な信仰を持つ者たちによって示され、切り開かれなければならない。従って、正しき殲滅の贈り物を受け取るのだ。そうすれば、審判の時が来たとき、正しい行動への道しるべとなるはずだ」
languages.original_text: {n}There is nothing in Incendia's clear eyes but a righteous conviction that almost seems inhuman.{/n} "That was the path revealed to me. You are going to a place where evil is being wrought against the Emperor. If you step into this darkness, you can pluck the poisoned root from which the vile deed stems. As such, your path must be charted and cleared by those pure of faith. Therefore, accept this gift of righteous annihilation so that, come the hour of judgement, it helps direct you to the right course of action."

traits.locale_text: {n}インセンディアの澄んだ瞳には、まるで非人間的な正義が燃えていた。{/n}「それが私に啓示された道だ。あなたは皇帝に対する悪が行われている場所に赴くのだろう。この暗闇に足を踏み入れれば、卑劣な行為に由来する毒の根を摘み取ることができる。それがため、あなたの道は、純粋な信仰を持つ者たちによって示され、切り開かれなければならない。従って、正しき殲滅の贈り物を受け取るのだ。そうすれば、審判の時が来たとき、正しい行動への道しるべとなるはずだ」
traits.speaker: Chorda_Companion

languages.text: {n}In Incendias klarem Blick ist nichts zu sehen als eine schon fast unmenschlich wirkende rechtschaffene Überzeugung.{/n} "Das war der Pfad, der mir offenbart wurde. Ihr geht an einen Ort, an dem Böses gegen den Imperator gewirkt wird. Wenn Ihr in diese Dunkelheit tretet, könnt Ihr die vergifteten Wurzeln herausreißen, aus denen diese schändliche Tat erwächst. Euer Pfad muss daher von jenen geplant und geebnet werden, die von reinstem Glauben sind. Akzeptiert daher dieses Geschenk der rechtschaffenen Auslöschung, auf dass es Euch in der Stunde des Urteils das richtige Vorgehen weise."
languages.original_text: {n}There is nothing in Incendia's clear eyes but a righteous conviction that almost seems inhuman.{/n} "That was the path revealed to me. You are going to a place where evil is being wrought against the Emperor. If you step into this darkness, you can pluck the poisoned root from which the vile deed stems. As such, your path must be charted and cleared by those pure of faith. Therefore, accept this gift of righteous annihilation so that, come the hour of judgement, it helps direct you to the right course of action."

Ihr geht an einen Ort, an dem Böses gegen den Imperator gewirkt wird. Wenn Ihr in diese Dunkelheit tretet, könnt Ihr die vergifteten Wurzeln herausreißen, aus denen diese schändliche Tat erwächst. Akzeptiert daher dieses Geschenk der rechtschaffenen Auslöschung, auf dass es Euch in der Stunde des Urteils das richtige Vorgehen weise."
traits.speaker: Chorda_Companion

languages.text: {n}İncendia'nın şeffaf gözlerinde; neredeyse insan dışı gözüken, doğrucu bir kanaattan başka bir şey yok.{/n} "Önüme açılan yol buydu. İmparator'a karşı kötülüğün işlendiği bir yere gidiyorsun. Bu karanlığa adım atarsan aşağılık eylemlerin yayıldığı zehirli kökleri koparıp atabilirsin. Bu yüzden yolun, saf inanca sahip olanlarca açılmalı ve temizlenmelidir. Bu haklı yıkım hediyesini kabul et, et ki hüküm vakti geldiğinde seni doğru kararı vermeye sevk etsin."
languages.original_text: {n}There is nothing in Incendia's clear eyes but a righteous conviction that almost seems inhuman.{/n} "That was the path revealed to me. You are going to a place where evil is being wrought against the Emperor. If you step into this darkness, you can pluck the poisoned root from which the vile deed stems. As such, your path must be charted and cleared by those pure of faith. Therefore, accept this gift of righteous annihilation so that, come the hour of judgement, it helps direct you to the right course of action."

traits.locale_text: {n}İncendia'nın şeffaf gözlerinde, neredeyse insan dışı gözüken doğrucu bir kanaattan başka bir şey yok.{/n} "Önüme açılan yol buydu. İmparator'a karşı kötülüğün işlendiği bir yere gidiyorsun. Bu karanlığa adım atarsan aşağılık eylemlerin yayıldığı zehirli kökleri koparıp atabilirsin. Bu yüzden yolun, saf inanca sahip olanlar tarafından açılmalı ve temizlenmelidir. Erdemli bir yok edişin hediyesini kabul et, et ki hüküm saati geldiğinde seni doğru olana yönlendirsin."
traits.speaker: Chorda_Companion
